title: Former IBA director Iqbal Ahmed dies
body: Professor Iqbal Ahmed, a former director of the Institute of Business Administration of Dhaka University, passed away at 9:15am on Saturday while undergoing treatment at a hospital in the capital. The funeral prayer of the late professor will be held after Zuhr prayers at the central mosque of the university. DU vice-chancellor Professor Niaz Ahmed Khan has expressed deep shock at the death of retired Professor Iqbal Ahmed of the Institute of Business Administration. In a condolence message, the vice-chancellor said that Iqbal Ahmed made a unique contribution to the field of business education and research in the country. The Vice-Chancellor prayed for the eternal peace of the deceased and expressed his deepest condolences to the bereaved family members.
